ISSUE.TITLE: `now ls` throws after logging in
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: now 6.3.1, macos `rm ~/.now.json` `now ls` I log in and see ``` Cannot read property 'username' of undefined at list (/snapshot/home/travis/build/zeit/now-cli/bin/now-list.js:148:145) ```

COMMIT.MESSAGE: same solution to just-logged-in as in... https://github.com/zeit/now-cli/blob/7.1.0/bin/now-deploy.js#L298 fixes https://github.com/zeit/now-cli/issues/633
Fixed property `username` not being defined (#700) https://github.com/zeit/now-cli/blob/7.1.0/bin/now-deploy.js#L298 fixes https://github.com/zeit/now-cli/issues/633
